Kicking off with the launch of the new LEGO sets before the 30th anniversary Pokémon Presents officially revealed the new Gen 10 mainline Pokémon Winds and Waves. We then saw the new Pokémon FireRed and LeafGreen officially release on Switch and Switch 2 before we made our way over to the official Nintendo Store in NYC to cap off the celebrations in person, and there are still some new pocket monster experiences set for release next month. As part of the announcements from the 30th anniversary Pokémon Presents for Pokémon Day 2026, Nintendo just teased a jukebox with the shape of a Game Boy. Nintendo really loves teasing fans with Game Boy nostalgia – first the LEGO Game Boy last year, and now this.
